channel.title: Running Source error
channel.description: when i run my source im useing Trisidiax it happends with every source i got well it Ses Exception In Main Thread [14/10/13] 15:51 java.net.bindexception adress already in use : bind can someone fix please

item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Stay on topic, please.

Read full topic

item.title: Running Source error
item.dc:creator: @hadesflames hadesflames
item.description:
@hadesflames wrote:

[quote=“Strucker, post:3, topic:534114”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=652912.msg4374730#msg4374730 date=1381768465]
You already have the source running, or something is blocking port 43594.
Solution: unblock it.
[/quote]check ur firewallz[/quote]

The firewall won’t stop a program from listening to a port. It will only stop data from passing through said port. The problem is something is ALREADY listening on that port. Only one thing can listen in on any one port at a time. He needs stop whatever application is using his rsps port and then continue. Alternatively, he could just change the port the server listens to, but if he’s just forgetting to shut down the server before starting a new one, then it won’t really solve his problem.

Read full topic
